markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Squad Tactics](/Feats.aspx?ID=2374) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=268" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 35 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are adept at working with your allies to surround a foe. If an enemy is within reach of you and at least two of your allies, that enemy is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against you.
name: Squad Tactics
